text: James Edwin Addicott (February 23, 1869 – March 22, 1957) was an American football coach and mathematics professor. He served as the head football coach at San Jose State University (then known as San Jose State Normal School during three separate stints in 1893, 1895 and 1900. Addicott was a fellow in the mathematics department at San Jose State from 1892 to 1900. He later served as high school principal at Isidore Newman School in New Orleans and San Francisco Polytechnic High School. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1869 births Category:1957 deaths Category:San Jose State Spartans football coaches Category:Columbia University alumni Category:Sportspeople from Taunton
title: James E. Addicott
